name: edguhgr
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cedg, c0))), wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ UHGraph ∧ c1 ∈(Edg ` c0))→ c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0)))

comment: An edge of a hypergraph is a subset of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 26-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 28-Nov-2020.)
